name: Call of Fries
description:
Try to get to the mouth! Beware of burgers, mushrooms and pasta!

Perhaps this is a simulator of fried potatoes ...

Here are some of the buns you will encounter in the game:
- colorful drawn graphics;
- completely physical world;
- burgers, mushrooms and pasta;
- pleasant guitar music;
- interesting and difficult situations.

Mouth is waiting for you!
Good Luck!
